TopicTitle: What do too be ideal video game like "scott manley" for exemple

Articles.Content: i created two episodes of "Take on Mars" now i plan to make separate series "for dummies" about creating sample rocket in KSP.

Well, to be ideal I think you would want to cover ground that is not already well covered by other tutorials. Tell people something that would really help them and which might not be obvious. For example what do you know now that would really have helped you when you were a noob?

Also, videos which are not boring and have creativity etc etc would be the most watched.

And double check your spelling and grammar otherwise people will not bother after reading the description!
